attributes.background: At the general election, 37% of the voting electorate got more than 50% of the MPs. 63% of the electorate voted against the party that now governs the country. The voting system should be changed to PR so that the parties that comprise the government have the support of a majority of the electorate.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104324

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
